arts.ttl: Vitor Pereira may have unforeseen selection dilemma for Leeds thanks to £10m Wolves man
arts.sum: Wolves are taking on Leeds United in the Premier League this weekend, and one fringe player may be expecting to start. As ever, the team Pereira puts out will be very interesting – and the goalkeeper selection against Leeds will be especially intriguing.

arts.ttl: Key Leeds United duo ‘major doubts’ to face Wolves
arts.sum: Leeds United wingers Daniel James and Wilfried Gnonto could miss this weekend’s trip to Wolves as they are “struggling” with injuries. James has played a part in all four of the Whites’ Premier League outings so far, but was substituted off the pitch with a calf injury towards the end of last weekend’s 1-0 defeat […] The post Key Leeds United duo ‘major doubts’ to face Wolves first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Strand Larsen available? Wolves predicted XI vs. Leeds
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at how Wolverhampton Wanderers could line up for Saturday afternoon's hosting of Leeds United in the Premier League.

arts.ttl: Stick or twist? Leeds predicted XI vs. Wolves
arts.sum: Sports Mole looks at how Leeds United could line up for their Premier League trip to Wolverhampton Wanderers on Saturday afternoon.

arts.ttl: Leeds boss makes attacking demand before Wolves clash
arts.sum: Leeds, bidding for their first away win of the season against a Wolves side who sit rock-bottom after losing all four of their Premier League games, could be without both Dan James (core muscle) and Willy Gnonto (calf) at Molineux. Leeds have yet to score in open play this season, with their opening-day win against Everton sealed through Lukas Nmecha’s penalty, and Farke said that is his only criticism of his side after their first four league matches.
